<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check whether we can merge loads/stores of some of the pieces of a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// flattened function parameter or return value into a single vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// load/store.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The flattened parameter is represented as a list of EVTs and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// offsets, and the whole structure is aligned to ParamAlignment. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function determines whether we can load/store pieces of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// parameter starting at index Idx using a single vectorized op of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// size AccessSize. If so, it returns the number of param pieces</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// covered by the vector op. Otherwise, it returns 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380" lineLink="#a42ca2573c85e6aa37315472c556116d1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a42ca2573c85e6aa37315472c556116d1">CanMergeParamLoadStoresStartingAt</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx, uint32&#95;t AccessSize, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;EVT&gt;</a> &amp;ValueVTs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> &amp;Offsets, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> ParamAlignment) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Can&#39;t vectorize if param alignment is not sufficient.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ParamAlignment &lt; AccessSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Can&#39;t vectorize if offset is not aligned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Offsets&#91;Idx&#93; &amp; (AccessSize - 1))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> EltVT = ValueVTs&#91;Idx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Element is too large to vectorize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EltSize &gt;= AccessSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElts = AccessSize / EltSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Can&#39;t vectorize if AccessBytes if not a multiple of EltSize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Idx + NumElts &gt; ValueVTs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j = Idx + 1; j &lt; Idx + NumElts; ++j) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l04272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4272"><Highlight kind="comment">/// getFunctionParamOptimizedAlign - since function arguments are passed via</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4273"><Highlight kind="comment">/// .param space, we may want to increase their alignment in a way that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4274"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ensures that we can effectively vectorize their loads &amp; stores. We can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4275"><Highlight kind="comment">/// increase alignment only if the function has internal or has private</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4276"><Highlight kind="comment">/// linkage as for other linkage types callers may already rely on default</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4277"><Highlight kind="comment">/// alignment. To allow using 128-bit vectorized loads/stores, this function</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l04530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4530"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For floating point:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4531"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do the fusion only when the mul has less than 5 uses and all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l04533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4533"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The heuristic is that if a use is not an add, then that use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4534"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cannot be fused into fma, therefore mul is still needed anyway.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4535"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are more than 4 uses, even if they are all add, fusing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4536"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// them will increase register pressue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l04550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4550"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// simple heuristics here for considering potential register</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
